other_tests.findings: At 2 months of age, patient 2 had a click-threshold of 70 dB right and 60 dB left, which increased to 100 dB right and 70 dB left at 2 months.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progression of hearing loss diagnosed, with thresholds at 15 months being 95 dB bilateral and at 20 months being unverifiable.

other_tests.findings: CT scans revealed a complex cystic malformation of the inner ear and vestibular structures, without separation of inner and middle ear.

other_tests.date: 5 years for patient 1; 2 years for patient 2
other_tests.findings: Patient 1 showed insufficient growth hormone levels after stimulation (max GH 6.27 ng/ml). Patient 2's test showed maximum GH of 6.08 ng/ml (norm > 7.25 ng/ml), consistent with growth hormone deficiency.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient 1 initially showed sufficient catch-up growth but later developed low IGF-1 and IGFBP-3 levels; therapy was discontinued due to compliance issues.
